Detailed Description

This class is used to store chromosome DNA sequences.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Chromosomes::Chromosomes ( char *  chrom_map_dir,
char *  chrom_map_name 
)

Class constructor.

Parameters:
chrom_map_dirthe directory where the chromosome map file is located
chrom_map_namethe name of the chromosome map file

Chromosome sequences are loaded on the fly from the *.fa files. For efficient sequence extraction, genomic intervals must be grouped by chromosome. If not, use the alternative constructor described below.

Example of map file (stored in chrom_map_name):

1 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.1.fa
10 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.10.fa
11 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.11.fa
12 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.12.fa
13 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.13.fa
14 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.14.fa
15 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.15.fa
16 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.16.fa
17 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.17.fa
18 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.18.fa
19 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.19.fa
2 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.2.fa
3 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.3.fa
4 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.4.fa
5 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.5.fa
6 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.6.fa
7 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.7.fa
8 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.8.fa
9 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.9.fa
MT <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.MT.fa
X <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.X.fa
Y <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.Y.fa

Chromosomes::Chromosomes ( char *  fasta_file,
bool  verbose 
)

Class constructor.

Parameters:
fasta_fileFASTA file containing chromosome sequences
verboseif 'true', print messages while loading chromosome sequences

Chromosome sequences are loaded in memory from the FASTA file. Example FASTA file:

>chromosome_1
TAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTA
>chromosome_2
CGTATCCCACACACCACACCCACACACCACACCCACACACACCCACACCC
>chromosome_3
TCCTCCCAGAATCTGGAGAGGTCAACCTGTTCTTCAAAGCAGTGGTGGAT
>chromosome_4
ACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTACCCTAACCCTAACC
